title: Interest groups use political action committees

content.prompt: Interest groups use political action committees (PACs) to

choices.label: provide expertise to members of Congress when they are writing legislation
lobby the executive bureaucracy when they are considering new rules and regulations
raise and spend money on election campaigns
generate research that can be used to influence public opinion
hire policy experts who will promote their views in the media

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
